name: I envy you, that you will touch the vault of heaven.
name_original: I envy you, that you will touch the vault of heaven.
description:
I envy you, that you will touch the vault of heaven.

Submission for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams Jam.
Made by Strachkvas and Rn7u
https://twitter.com/StrachkvasOne
https://www.instagram.com/thereza.hereze/ 
We started wildly overambitious, and then did not have time to work on it, so there's not really a game yet. Click through some scenes and enjoy the atmosphere. Don't worry though, we will either continue working on this, or more likely, reuse the assets and concepts in future projects. 

Controls

Click your mouse around

Press W to go up in the tower scene

WSAD to move around in the combat mode. If you want to attack enemy directly, make sure you are close enough. Try throwing something at the pillars. It's pretty cool. 

Alt + F4 to close the game (sorry about that)
